shortDescription.text: CVE-2022-24302 medium vulnerability for paramiko package

fullDescription.text: In Paramiko before 2.10.1, a race condition (between creation and chmod) in the write_private_key_file function could allow unauthorized information disclosure.

help.text:
Vulnerability CVE-2022-24302
Severity: medium
Package: paramiko
Version: 2.9.2
Fix Version: 
Type: python
Location: /usr/lib/mysqlsh/lib/python3.9/site-packages/paramiko-2.9.2.dist-info/METADATA
Data Namespace: nvd
Link: [CVE-2022-24302](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-24302)
help.markdown:
